title: Lea Coffee
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in North Tel Aviv's Hadar Yosef neighborhood, this place offers a menu with vegan choices such as: breakfast, tapas, sandwiches, salads, hot dishes like couscous and stuffed vegetables, and pasta. There are a few veganizable items as well. Business lunch special 12-4pm.
